president.name: Rahul Amulya Pradhan
president.caption: Mukh Bandh Kaam Suru is a Public Charitable Trust registered under the Indian Trust Act 1960 in Darjeeling, India. We are dedicated towards bringing back the lost essence of Darjeeling Hills.
